website_summaries.verdict: This top-of-the-line putter will help you putt like a pro.
pros: Equipped with a milled face that provides a soft touch
Stainless steel construction ensures the putter will maintain its appearance both now and in after seasons of putting
Available in standard and over-sized grip options
Comes with a durable head cover
cons: Grip may be slippery at times
Putter's lineup line may be crooked

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this putter. The deep milling creates a super soft feel, but not pillowy like some of the polymer insert putters. Even with the soft feel there is still good feedback. The weight is fantastic, and although the grip feels awkward at first, it grows on you very quickly as it helps you square the putter. I have never been a great putter, and I have always preferred slower greens. Something about this putter just clicked with me, and I am putting better than I ever have been. I've tried pretty much every brand, and recently bagged a Scotty and a Ping; I would take this hands down over any other putter.
customer_reviews.author: DadGolferTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Arrived pretty quick and as expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived pretty quick and as expected. The photos didn't show the grip and head cover so I provided my own photos.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing putter except for the grip
customer_reviews.text: I have a few putters including a Scotty Cameron Newport 2, Ping anser and odyssey 2 Ball. I bought this putter for a change of pace and wow I love this putter. The milled face rolls like my Cameron and the shape is similar to my Ping. The only downside of this putter is they chose to put what I think is a pretty slippery grip. But overall this is a fantastic putter for the value!
customer_reviews.author: Hoppaguy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but maybe not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I had an odyssey white hot putter before this. It had a super soft feel. This putter on the other hand has a very sterile feel to it. I cannot judge the feedback on this. My distance and speed has been totally out of whack. I've gone from a consistent 2 putter to 3+. My game has suffered greatly and I might go back to odyssey. The club itself is beautiful. Looks 3x the price. The grip sucks. Too thin and slippery. Maybe I need to upgrade the grip but not sure I want to sink in more money for something that is not working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bui

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This club is absolutely beautiful. I haven't played with it yet but I am completely confident it is a perfect fit for my game. I am a firm believer in the benefits that having the right club in your hand gives you the confidence to play better, and I think this putter well suit my game very well. Highly recommend especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: C Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent putter
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the same putter for about 15 years (Nike) and have tried others but never found one that felt right, this one just feels good when you grip it and puts a good roll on the ball
customer_reviews.author: MichaelG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Putter
customer_reviews.text: Much better feel and weight balanced than cheaper ones. Remember you get what you pay for most of the time. |However with this putter its clearly in the |Scotty Cameron area of quality ditched the factory grip and went with an oversized WINN grip, better feel that to supersoft grips.
customer_reviews.author: W. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great shape, weight, feel and nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: I love this putter, the blade style performs very well. I still suck, at least i look like I know what im doing with this sweet looking stick. I leave it in my studio it looks so nice i cant help but pick it up and practice constantly. For what i paid its well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Billy J.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Minimum damage during shipping but not enough to return. I hated the feel of the grip but quickly changed my mind on the golf course. It is a nice putter especially for the price. I now really like the grip as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Patronski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome putter, the milled face really allows to hit the ball flush
customer_reviews.author: miket13

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a great deal. Very very nice putter. First time I used it on a course, I sunk a 12 foot put with it (a good omen). Has helped my putting quite a bit. Very happy and will use it for the near future and possibly the long haul!
customer_reviews.author: RSB

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter at an amazingly great price.
customer_reviews.text: Aside from how amazing it looks and the price, this putter works amazing. I was skeptical how the face would work but when you make contact with the ball you can feel the control. It really does work beautifully. The grip is comfortable it’s well balanced, and the head cover it comes with is really nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Great putter
customer_reviews.text: Great putter . A little heavy. The face is a deeper cut and controls the ball so well . The other guys were not happy that I was sinking putts left and right .
customer_reviews.author: Russell weinrich

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great putter, nice milled face, good balance. The putter met all my expectations. In truth, the putter is great, far better than my putting. Great value, well made, nice head cover included as well. I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Groves

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel
customer_reviews.text: I did put a new super stroke grip on it for a better feel ,but that is personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: rred

customer_reviews.title: Great club !!
customer_reviews.text: I have found this club to be awesome true and fabulous it's a little heavy headed took me a second to get used to but now that I have I'm draining more puts than ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: outstanding feel, weight, alignment, value
customer_reviews.text: really nice weight, outstanding super soft feel. super easy alignment = more great putts. really high quality and high value. no reason to spend 250 on Cameron!
customer_reviews.author: MilesColtrane

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: First putt in a round with this was a 25 footer from the fringe and it went center cup. Played just one round with this but my putting was noticeably more consistent and accurate. I probably shaved about six putts off my round. My previous putter was a junk mallet that I'd had for fifteen years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: A more affordable Scotty
customer_reviews.text: Great balance during the stroke. Comparable to a Scotty. But much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob S.

customer_reviews.title: Cleveland Golf Huntington Beach #1 Golf Putter
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be a great addition to my bag. I have been using an Odyssey 3-ball and wanted to go back to a nice blade without the $400 price tag... Great balance out of the box and very consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Russ...

customer_reviews.title: Great club. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my old putter feom about 100 years ago. I'm very impresed with it. The weight distribution makes it easy to make consistent strokes. It also looks great aesthetically.
customer_reviews.author: amac

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a nice putter. Only thing I did not like was the grip.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reliable and Gold rated for 2017 and 2018 by Golf Digest
customer_reviews.author: Bucsfan09

customer_reviews.title: Nice putter
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new putter and I went with this one, will try it out this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: BTC29

customer_reviews.title: Old school with feel.
customer_reviews.text: A little bit old school design with a softer feel. Ball skids on me for about 4 inches on an 8 ft putt but Ive been able to adjust to it. I haven't figured out how to get it rolling right off the face on medium to long putts.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Awesome putter! It's great looking, well balanced and rolls awesome. Have recommended this putter to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid putter
customer_reviews.text: Nice weighted putter. I feel like I get good control over my puts.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Crosby Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Putter!
customer_reviews.text: Saved me a few strokes on the first time on the course - now I just need to fix the other parts of my game...
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin V

customer_reviews.title: Good putter
customer_reviews.text: Ball rolls as soon as you hit it, no skipping
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: I came, I saw, I putted
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this putter. The weight is perfect for me and the ball rolls much better off the head.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Make all your putts..
customer_reviews.text: Good feel, excellent alignment & will eliminate any 3 putts...very good putter.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great putter. Although not much feel when contacting the ball.
customer_reviews.author: MSB

customer_reviews.title: Solid putter
customer_reviews.text: I switched from a mallet back to this blade putter which fits my putting stroke better. Clean contact that I fee more in my hands which makes me feel like I have more control.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Thinking of Joining the PGA Tour
customer_reviews.text: I never miss a putt anymore. Great feel and great quality. If you’re looking for a great putter at a good price look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Putter looks and feels good which is important when I miss that 3 footer for par
customer_reviews.author: Ron Forte

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a year now and am happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Love this putter
customer_reviews.text: Love this putter. Feels great - closest thing to a Scotty I have ever hit and a quarter of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Cleavland putter
customer_reviews.text: Nice putter, but I'd like it more if it had a slightly thicker grip.
customer_reviews.author: John Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now
customer_reviews.text: This putter will change your life. Buy it. Now. It's an amazing deal and an amazing putter.
customer_reviews.author: james nokes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just took my odyssey putter out of the bag for this. Incredible putter for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great club for the money soft feel
customer_reviews.text: Has a great feel good roll. Very happy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter
customer_reviews.text: I really like this putter, I have gone and tried 4 putters before this one and it’s juat great ball comes off the face and the weight and length and cool style is perfect, recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: raymond merrill

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling putter.
customer_reviews.text: Has a very heavy, solid feel for a blade putter.
customer_reviews.author: Weston Richard Hume

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: You can spend a bunch more money for a putter of this quality. Great putter.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sjoblom

customer_reviews.title: but love the feel and balance of this putter
customer_reviews.text: I still cannot putt, but love the feel and balance of this putter.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Burke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great putter, went from a mallet to this! Should have done it 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knockin em down
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe it, the first 6 puts on the course....sank em!! Quality made product and am eager to sink more!
customer_reviews.author: brett flowers

customer_reviews.title: Cleveland makes a well balanced putter.
customer_reviews.text: Cleveland makes a well balanced putter. Nothing fancy with this putter, but very consistent and well gripped. I would definitely purchase from this seller again. It came with a nice club protector as well. The grip was comparable to a ping butter, but it felt a little bit looser as it got warmer outside. Overall this putter seams like it will be in my bag for a long time coming.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This putter is amazing. It has beautiful classic look with the combination of a milled face. They used a softer metal which adds to a softer feel on the green. After switching to this from an Odyssey 2-ball my puts were farm more accurate. This putter is and amazing deal! If you are thinking of a blade putter that looks nice, is affordable, and performs just as good as the best, then you have found your putter. Buy it and you won't regret it! Also give a look at the other style putter heads and grip they have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the putter I love: it's balance
customer_reviews.text: This is the putter I love: it's balance, stable, simple, no funky stupid gimmicks, I make more putts with it, excellent quality. I recommend it to my fellow golfers.
customer_reviews.author: Chie^`u Ti'm, Ca 92656

customer_reviews.title: You could pay 300 or more and still not get a better
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, lines up well and sounds solid . gets the ball rolling on line. You could pay 300 or more and still not get a better putter
customer_reviews.author: R.D. Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice putter, similar to my Scotty Cameron as a third of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I should've sent it back . The putter did not line up properly. The lineup line was crooked. Used it two or three times and gave up. I would not recommend purchasing this Putter from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: frank fusilli jr

customer_reviews.title: Better than a cheap putter but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It's a putter, guess it is worth the cost. I do not like the weight to it, but since I only play an occasional round it will do me for the next year or so.
customer_reviews.author: George Francis

customer_reviews.title: Bad service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a lefty 33 inch blade and received a righty 34 inch mallet. Immediately returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: David A.
